posts.content:
Our just finished panel van was stolen off my parents driveway at 3am last night. 3 "hoodies" were seen pushing it off the road before they started it and drove off.

Here are some pictures









the amount of our own blood, sweat and tears that has go in to that van is heartbreaking. My Dad never gets upset but he was when he had to tell me this morning.

It was a double door '66 with Bullet indicator conversion.
beige porsche seats in the front
Full rock and roll bed in back.
Beige cream mad matz tiles in back.
Twin Kadrons on a 1600 tp.
Creative steering rack.
Moto-Lita wooden steering wheel.
Double side steps.
BRM Wheels,
1 silver BRM Spare wheel.
5 bow Roof rack.
Big Stereo,
2 tv screens.
Front and back safari windows.

PLEASE KEEP A LOOK OUT

07929 760213
07710 447531

REWARD GIVEN!!!

it is insured but this van means so much more than money to us.

Ricky,
I feel for you fella.
Will keep my eyes well and truly peeled for this.
Fingers crossed its found in 1 piece.
Adam

Sorry to hear this, ...you must be gutted.

Il keep my eyes and ears peeled in the northwest.

Eyes peeled in North Yorkshire fella. So sorry to hear about another stolen bus. Sadly this seems to be getting more common.

It is a pretty distinctive bus being a 66 with bullets, fingers crossed she will reappear in the VW scene.

Just had a call from the police and they have found the bus!!!! they said it's un-damaged, we will see. main thing is we have it back!! Just need to sort the thieving ******* out now!!!

thanks for your support guys

Bring the thieving c***s down to Bugjam so everyone can say hello

Glad the bus is back with it's rightful owners.

Tridau wrote::cheers:

Bring the thieving c***s down to Bugjam so everyone can say hello

Glad the bus is back with it's rightful owners.


Now that sounds a cracking idea!!! Would love to meet them!!

rickyday33 wrote:Just had a call from the police and they have found the bus!!!! they said it's un-damaged, we will see. main thing is we have it back!! Just need to sort the thieving ******* out now!!!

thanks for your support guys


Excellent news
Fingers doubley crossed that damage is limted to just the Twocking.
I am sure these youths would be made to feel very welcome at Bugjam. Hearty pats on the back, face, stomach etc !
Scumbags.

rickyday33 wrote:Just had a call from the police and they have found the bus!!!! they said it's un-damaged, we will see. main thing is we have it back!! Just need to sort the thieving ******* out now!!!

thanks for your support guys


Fantastic, what a relief

GLad they have found it, but I think you are crazy leaving a split bus on a drive without an alarm and an immobiliser.

Admittedly an immobiliser is quite easy to defeat, but additional steps can be taken (like removing the rotor arm or the main coil lead)

paul_f wrote:GLad they have found it, but I think you are crazy leaving a split bus on a drive without an alarm and an immobiliser.

Admittedly an immobiliser is quite easy to defeat, but additional steps can be taken (like removing the rotor arm or the main coil lead)


thanks

I think we know we did wrong...... I have a tracker, cat1 alarm immobiliser with proxy sensors and a disk lock on my bus so we are fully aware what we need now!!

If you had an alarm why didn't it go off then? (or have you got another split as well?)

I have seen a few poorly fitted CAT1 alarms on buses (they haven't had pin switches put on the doors)
the alarm is on my van, the bus that was stolen was my dads

Good news man. I hope everything is alright.
Some theiving b*stewards broke into my van last night.
Stole my Teng socket set, Ratchet spanners and trolley jack.
She's on axel stands at the moment as I'm fitting disc brakes.
Not sure how I'm going to get her back on the floor!!!!!

author.location: Cotswolds border, nr Stratford Upon Avon.

posts.content:
rickyday33 wrote:Just had a call from the police and they have found the bus!!!! they said it's un-damaged, we will see. main thing is we have it back!! Just need to sort the thieving ******* out now!!!

thanks for your support guys


Absolutely fantastic new that you got it back

One day, one day the thieves will get whats coming to them
